Comment: I don't get it.  Why didn't Google just write the code that if the user is on an American ISP or their IP address is in America, display "Gulf of America" and then keep "Gulf of Mexico" for everyone else??    There maybe ~330million in the USA lead by an orange twat, but the rest of the world isn't America. If Cheeto in Charge wants Americans to see "Gulf of America" so be it. Rest of the world has the right to tell him to fuck off.  Mexico shouldn't only sue Google but insist that unless Mexican IP addresses and ISP's see Gulf of Mexico there'll be further legal actions/restrictions/limitations on Google.  All other nations should effectively join as a class action too.    Same applies to the Persian/Arabian Gulf and any other tech company who want to act like this
